author: Staff Reporter
text: A 32-year-old woman, along with his six-year-old son, staged a protest in front of the house of a textile entrepreneur at Kottaiamman Street in the city on Friday. The woman alleged that the entrepreneur, her husband’s business partner, had duped them to the tune of Rs. 70 lakh. She gave up the protest after the police officials assured her to find a solution to the issue. - Staff Reporter
title: Woman stages protest
